benchmark_details.name: MAVEN -ARG
benchmark_details.overview: MAVEN -ARG is an event argument extraction dataset that augments MAVEN datasets with event argument annotations, making it the first all-in-one dataset supporting event detection, event argument extraction (EAE), and event relation extraction.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To complete the all-in-one event understanding dataset, supporting event detection, argument extraction, and event relation extraction.

data.source: Annotated from MAVEN datasets using a comprehensive event argument annotation schema.
data.annotation: Human annotation by a team of experts

methodology.calculation: Evaluation is based on traditional metrics adapted for multi-answer question answering tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in correctly identifying event arguments.
methodology.baseline_results: State-of-the-art EAE models achieve moderate performance, with F1 scores around 40%.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: The MAVEN dataset is released under the CC BY-SA 4.0 license.
